sect2.title: Installation of j2sdk
sect2.para: Before installing j2sdk, you need to download libstdc++-libc6.1-1.so.2.bz2 from , and decompress it to your source directory.
Install j2sdk by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: mkdir java && mv j2sdk*.bin java && cd java && chmod 711 j2sdk*.bin && ./j2sdk*.bin && mv j2sdk*.bin .. && cp ../libstdc++-libc6.1-1.so.2 j2sdk&j2sdk-version;/jre/lib/i386

sect2.para: Test the installation with the following commands:
If you get a version line, a description of the runtime environment and a desrciption of the client VM (virtual machine), you are ready to go.
